issues.description: Modifies spy call arguments in place. calledArgs[j] is overwritten with a quoted value, altering spyInstance.getCall(i).args and corrupting recorded call data.
Checks if (calledArgs[j]) and if (expectedArgs[j]) before quoting. Falsy values such as empty strings are skipped, so they wonâ€™t be quoted, giving inconsistent message output.
